name: Ollie Husband
bio:
I am a focused and ambitious freelance front end developer with solid experience creating hand coded sites, games and applications. Due to my background in backend technolgies I am also comfortable taking ownership of the full stack whether it be node or PHP, mongo or MySQL.
My Passion for web development coupled with my ability to pick up new skills quickly means that I stay on top of all relevant technologies and directions. I achieve this my attending various conferences and talks around the country and spending my free time experimenting and finding uses for modern development trends.
I also have an interest and good understanding of UI and design, and I enjoy being involved in the process from the start.

work.name: Infiniti
work.description: In dealership visualiser for luxury car brand Infiniti
work.case_study: This was a touch screen application written using Front End Tecnologies (JS/CSS/HTML). The main issue I overcame in this project were full support for IE6 and exceeding memory issues that crop up with asset loading.

work.name: Honda Accessories
work.case_study: Parallax microsite for Honda accesssories created using front end technologies (JS, CSS, HTML, JSON). Including locale specific pricing and languages using JSON as data storage. Basic mobile solutions using responsive JS and media queries.

work.name: Saddington Baynes
work.case_study: Custom agency site and corresponding CMS for agency Saddington Baynes. Built using (JS, SASS, HTML, PHP, MySQL). The site was very well recieved and on launch recieved a honourable mention award from Awwwards after recieving an average judge score of 8/10 for content/design and build.

work.name: Leland Music
work.case_study: Custom portfolio site for independent music agency Leland Music. Built using front end technologies (JS, CSS, HTML) and backend technolgies (PHP, MySQL).

work.name: David Titlow
work.case_study: Custom portfolio site celebrity photographer David Titlow built using JS, SASS, HTML, PHP. Site uses a scroll hijacking method of navigation to get around the page.

work.name: Infiniti
work.case_study: Online responsive configurator for luxury car brand Infiniti with corresponding custom CMS. The front end application was made using front end technologies (JS/BACKBONE, Grunt, sass, require) abd the cms using php/Slimphp, composer and bootstrap. This large scale project involved a complicated backend system and intelligent mechanics on the front end to quickly and efficiently allow the user to configure their vehicle. Backbone/Marrionette MVW architecture was chosen for this project as it allowed me to keep a single page application and communicate easily with the RESTful API I put in place.

work.name: Board Intelligence
work.case_study: Custom resonsive site build for board intelligence.

work.name: My Codepen"s
work.case_study:
I love creating and trying out new things with code to see its limtations and what can be achieved. So codepen has been a big help along the way. Here"s a few of my more favourite codepens

work.name: Eagle Moss
work.case_study: Working for Saatchi & Saatchi, London, I created the front end for the magazine company eaglemoss. Using HTML/JS/Grunt/Less

work.name: The door
work.case_study: Working for Saatchi & Saatchi, London, I created the online application for the saatchi grad scheme. Using JS/backbone/Underscore/grunt/sass
